translations: 卖弄风情的女人；冠蜂鸟

sentences.sentence: He likes girls that play the coquette.
sentences.translation: 他喜欢卖弄风情的女子。

sentences.sentence: You the man who will not understand coquette!
sentences.translation: 你这个永远也不懂风情的人！

sentences.sentence: Having vindicated his courage, he very properly punished the coquette by taking no further notice of her.
sentences.translation: 他证实了自己的勇气之后，就不再理睬那卖弄风情的侍女，给了她应得的惩罚。
